courses.advice_detail_en: A bit chilly but good for running. Light layering works well. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. Surface is dry with low risk of slipping. Air quality is very poor. Indoor exercise or rest is recommended instead of outdoor running. Extra cautions: Very poor air. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
